name: Astroboy 3D Hopper
description:
Astroboy 3D Hopper

Originally this was going to be a 3D version of my Astroboy and the Blobbians 2D platformer, but after losing all my data I went for something slightly different.

You are the infamous Astroboy working for S.P.A.C.E recovery. You have been sent to sector F11 in response to multiple distress signals, to find and bring back the all important Jet Crystals (never mind the survivors).

Jump, float and bounce your way through 3 distinct levels

Level 1 focuses on movement and understanding the limits of your abilities

Level 2 focuses on enemy avoidance and platform mechanics

Level 3 is free-form giving you the choice of how to proceed and complete your objective

Enjoy the short, silly narrative story, objectives are found in the pause menu.

Special lighting system, backgrounds, particle systems and more!

Created by: Daryl (Bard) Peel with assets from MSU
